# mapSize

**Instance Property**

The overall size of the tile map.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mapSize: CGSize { get }
```

```swift
var mapSize: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

For a grid set type, the overall size, in points, of the node will be [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/numberOfColumns] `*` [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/tileSize] `.` [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGSize/width] wide and [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKWarpGeometryGrid/numberOfRows] `*` [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/tileSize] `.` [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGSize/height] high.

## Querying the Tile Map’s Properties

- **centerOfTile(atColumn:row:)**
- **tileColumnIndex(fromPosition:)**
- **tileDefinition(atColumn:row:)**
- **tileGroup(atColumn:row:)**
- **tileRowIndex(fromPosition:)**: Returns the tile map node object’s tile row index for the specified position in points.
